class.name: Safely
class.description: Singleton class for safely creating [code]Result[/code]s. Needed since Godot does not allow for exposing static functions to GDScript.

method.name: ok
method.description: Constructs a [code]Result[/code] and optionally stores a value. If no value is provided, [code]OK[/code] is stored instead. Trying to store [code]null[/code] will result in an error.

method.name: err
method.description: Constructs a [code]SafeError[/code] with the given code. Providing a description is optional. That [code]SafeError[/code] is then stored in a [code]Result[/code].
